runs.comm: Pakistan cannot believe that isn't lbw! Amir has bowled a scorching yorker, angling across the right-hander and then bending back to hit the toe of the front foot. That looks so good. I think Rohit is really lucky ...

Amir's got him this time! Another incredible ball, slanting across Rohit at pace from over the wicket, pitching on a good length around off and bending back into the right-hander, beating the inside edge of the bat to crash into the pad. The umpire takes a while but eventually sends Rohit on his way. Two outstanding balls from Amir. That one is crashing into middle stump
a fuller and wider ball outside off, Kohli tries to drive but gets a thick outside edge to third man
strays down leg side, Rahane misses the glance

another lbw!! Amir is bowling a sensational first over. Rahane knows that the ball is slanting across him from over the wicket, he knows it is going to bend back viciously late, but he can't do anything about it. He tries to defend on the leg side, closing the face a touch, but he misses and gets struck plumb in front. This is bowling of the highest skill
Raina is beaten comprehensively first ball. Short of a length outside off and seaming away from the left hander, he pokes in hope
moves forward and towards the off side to defend one that moves away from him to the bowler
good length outside off stump, Kohli stays back and opens the face, the man at backward point dives to his right to field
good bounce from a good length outside off, Kohli stays back and defends on the off side
strays on to middle and leg, flicked off the pads behind square for a single
Kohli meets a good length ball on off stump with a perfectly straight bat, solid defence
chips a good length ball towards mid on where Wahab misfields to allow the second run, Pakistan cannot afford such shoddiness in the field
good length outside off, seams away a touch, Kohli shoulders arms
Raina jams his bat down on a good length ball outside off and gets an inside edge on the leg side
good length angling across the right-hander, Kohli stays back and blocks

another massive appeal for lbw, the umpire signals leg byes too so there was no inside edge! Kohli moved forward and across to turn the ball through square leg but missed. The ball swung into him and hit him on the thigh. That might have clipped the top of the stumps, really, really close

caught at mid-on! Amir has a third! Raina moved forward and across to the off side to turn the ball on the leg, poor choice of shot when the ball pitches on a good length and seams away from the left-hander. The leading edge lobbed tamely to Wahab
Yuvraj has let the ball go over off stump! Amir seamed the ball into the left-hander this time from outside off, Yuvraj expected it to move away. He was saved by the bounce
good length outside off, Kohli pushes forward and defends towards cover. Amir has been a joy to watch today
full ball to begin with, outside off, Yuvraj stays in his crease and drives powerfully through cover
full again around off, Yuvraj tries to drive again on the off but gets an inside edge on the leg side
Yuvraj inside edges past his stumps! He stayed in his crease to a full ball and defended, the ball bounced over the stumps
short of a length around off, Yuvraj dabs the ball on the off side but doesn't get the single
oh my word, that short ball has leapt up at 146kph past Yuvraj's nose has he jumped back and swayed away from the line to let the ball pass
full and fast this time, zipping past the outside edge of Yuvraj's forward defence, 144 kph that was
Kohli has a wry smile as an Amir bouncer sails over the top of his head and also over the top of the keeper's head, that was so high, a wasted delivery
edged between slip and gully to third man! Amir slanted the short of a length ball across the right-hander, Kohli was on the front foot and poked at it
Yuvraj stays back and opens the face to steer the ball past point

the ring of fielders is close on the off side, Kohli punches the ball off the front foot to point, the fielder throws the ball at the bowler's end and hits the umpire just above the knee! He's hopping in pain. Umar Akmal raises his arm in apology. 146 kph
a full ball outside off, Kohli reaches for it instead of moving closer to it and mis-times the ball into the off side
good length angling across the right-hander, Kohli stays in his crease and plays into the covers, that was nearly 147 kph
Amir goes around the wicket and gets the ball to hold its line from a good length outside off, Kohli prods and is beaten
Yuvraj is so late on Irfan's deliveries, this one nips into the left-hander from a good length outside off and cuts Yuvraj in half as he pushes forward to defend, 142 kph
strays down leg side this time, Sarfraz does well to stop it by diving to his right

short of a length, Yuvraj is hurried for time as he tries to pull of the back foot but manages to middle it, the ball drops just short of Sharjeel at square leg as he dives to his right to make the save
Yuvraj is cut in half by a good length ball once again as he pushes forward to defend, 146 kph
this time he shoulders arms to a good length delivery outside off
short of a length outside off, Yuvraj covers his off stump and lets it go
short of a length and fast outside off stump, 141 kph, Yuvraj lets it go
good length and the ball bounces a bit more on Kohli as he pushes forward to play the ball to point
that's chipped off the hips in the air but wide of the fielder at square leg and once it beats the infield the ball races to the boundary, Kohli jumped back and across to hit that ball sweetly
sensational shot from Kohli, moving forward to a length ball outside off and driving it so smoothly through covers, smack out of the middle, can watch that all day
pushed off the front foot towards point
that ball kept low on a good length outside off, Kohli stays in his crease and defends, couching after he does so, he looks at the bottom of his bat after the delivery, 146 kph
Kohli has seen off the Amir threat, he strides forward and opens the face to play the last ball to backward point, 141 kph
Yuvraj stays back and defends a good length ball on the off side
jumps back in his crease to tuck a short of a length ball on the leg side for a single
Kohli jumps back and opens the face to steer the ball to backward point where Anwar Ali dives to his left to save runs
Kohli stays back again and opens the face to steer it to gully
short of the man at first slip! Kohli pushed forward and opened the face, steering the ball just wide of the diving slip fielder and beating third man too
nudged off the pads behind square leg for a single
Wahab begins with a full ball with width outside off delivered from over the wicket, Kohli meets it on the front foot and dispatches the 150kph delivery with a flowing cover drive
too straight this time, Kohli moves forward and across and clips it neatly through midwicket
Kohli is timing it like a dream, batting as good as Amir was bowling. He leans forward to another full one and drives through cover, perfection. That was 146 kph
stays back and dabs the length ball to third man
full and straight, Yuvraj flicks it off his toes and hasn't he timed it well? The ball races to the backward square leg boundary, this over has all but sealed the game, you'd imagine
defended from the crease on the leg side
Kohli strides forward to drive a good length ball on a tight line through cover but gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
a full and fast ball, nearly in the blockhole, Kohli is almost squared up but manages to defend on the off side, 145 kph that was
short of a length outside off, Kohli lets it go
good length on off, Kohli has the luxury of being able to defend with a straight bat, back to the bowler
a length ball outside off, Kohli has room to play his cover drive on the front foot and times it so well, there's a fielder in the deep though
the bouncer at 142 kph on a great line, Yuvraj half pulls and half ducks and is beaten, that flew over his left shoulder
Wahab is having a terrible day, Kohli tucks the no-ball off his pads through midwicket, free-hit coming up
a full toss outside off but Yuvraj hits it straight to cover!  He wastes the free-hit
Yuvraj thought that 148kph delivery was going to bounce more than it did from short of a length, instead it skidded on to him and hit the bat as he was swaying out of the line of the ball
Yuvraj gets hit on the thigh by a short of a length ball that rushes him for time as he tries to play on the leg side, Yuvraj is struggling out there but he is fighting
a short of a length ball down leg side, Yuvraj is late on the pull
short of a length outside off, Yuvraj cuts to point, that was measured at only 131kph
again he has no time to play a proper pull and ends up swatting the short of a length ball towards long leg
the slower ball outside off, Kohli stays back and steers it to third man to raise the 50 partnership
short of a length and wide outside off, Kohli tries to hit the ball through cover off the back foot but is beaten by the extra bounce
good length on a line just outside off, Kohli defends on the off side
such class from Kohli, moving across his crease with smoothness and flicking the ball crisply off his pads to the midwicket boundary
short ball, Kohli moves across his crease and swivels to pull the ball down through square leg
good length angling across the left-hander from over the wicket at 141 kph, Yuvraj wafts at it from his crease and is beaten
moves back and plays a punchy drive to a fuller ball towards mid off
Kohli moves forward and towards the off side to counter the angle across him and defends with a straight bat
short of a length and at the body, Kohli moves across in his crease and tucks the ball through midwicket
banged in short, Kohli lets the bouncer pass
good length around off stump, Kohli stays back and defends on the off side
good length angling into the right-hander, Kohli steers it off the front foot to third man, it's a no-ball and Kohli has once again given the free-hit to yuvraj
good length ball just outside off, Yuvraj stays back and pulls, mis-timing it towards wide long-on
stays back to a length ball and opens the face late to steer to third man
good length outside off, Kohli mis-times the drive towards cover
short of a length with width outside off, Kohli moves forward and towards the off side to play a cracking square drive to deep point
Yuvraj stays back and nudges the ball off his pads towards midwicket
another one of those sublime cover drives, Kohli presses forward and drives a length ball through the line, tremendous timing
drops the ball towards point for a single
banged in short around off stump, Yuvraj fends awkwardly and is beaten

Kohli's been given lbw and he does not like the decision! Was there an inside edge? He walks off with a wry smile and that's because there was an inside edge. He moved back and across to turn a good length ball through the leg side but was beaten by the nip into him and hit on the front pad. He's played a marvellous innings today, against high quality swing bowling at serious pace.
stays back and plays the ball on the off side
and another one goes! Pandya flashes at a good length ball just outside off and edges straight to first slip, Hafeez juggles the catch not once but twice but holds on in the end!
in the blockhole on off stump, Dhoni stays back and plays it to mid off
Dhoni moves back and across and punches the ball towards cover where a mis-field allows three runs
Yuvraj moves back and across and works the ball off his hips behind square leg
Yuvraj gets hit on the pad by a good length ball that angles into him, the ball drops at his feet and Yuvraj picks it up immediately and gives it to the bowler. He shouldn't be doing that!
played behind square leg for a single
that's the victory for India! Dhoni smashes a length ball through cover and picks up a stump as a keepsake, he might not be allowed to keep that, these new LED stumps have to stay
